text: The 2019–20 Torino F.C. season was the club's 109th season of competitive football, 92nd season in the top division of Italian football and 75th season in Serie A. The club competed in Serie A, the Coppa Italia, and, following Milan's exclusion from the competition following their breach of Financial Fair Play regulations, in the UEFA Europa League, starting in the second qualifying round. The season was coach Walter Mazzarri's second full campaign in charge of Torino, after replacing Siniša Mihajlović following his sacking during the 2017–18 season. ==Players== ===Squad information===
